articles.author: Bianca Setionago
articles.title: Mentally-passive sedentary activities linked to 43% higher depression risk - PsyPost
articles.description: A study found that mentally-passive activities like watching TV increase depression risk by 43%, linked to obesity and inflammation. In contrast, mentally-active behaviors such as sitting at work do not have the same effect.
articles.content: Some sitting activities may be more harmful than others. A new study suggests that mentally-passive sedentary behavior such as watching TV may increase the risk of developing depression, while mental… [+3556 chars]

articles.title: Why does hair turn grey? Journey of hair aging and potential solutions - Geo News
articles.description: Historically, stress has been linked to premature greying, a connection now supported by research
articles.content:
The enigma of why our hair turns grey has fascinated humanity for centuries, leading to various cultural beliefs and myths.
